introduction.achievements4: medal of excellence in worldskils special edition

about_me.title: Sobre mi
about_me.info:
I'm Juan Diego, a passionate software developer specializing in web and mobile development.

I represented Colombia in the WorldSkills 2022 competition and won a medal of excellence thanks to my skills and knowledge in different programming languages, API design, SQL and design patterns.

I love learning new tools and updating myself day by day with the latest technology. If you want to know more about my work experience, take a look at my LinkedIn profile or scroll down and see some of my work.
